scripts.configure: if command -v ninja > /dev/null; then export CMAKE_FLAGS="$CMAKE_FLAGS -G Ninja"; fi; cmake -S . -B build $CMAKE_FLAGS
scripts.build: if [ ! -d build/CMakeCache.txt ]; then npm run configure; fi; cmake --build build
scripts.cleanall: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json protos/generated/*
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build && cp -r build/protos dist/
